assembly.title: Our Congregation
assembly.descExpanded: Our Congregation is based in Wavre and its territory extends to Louvain-la-Neuve.

belgium.title: The Belgian Spirit
belgium.atomium: The futuristic symbol of 1958. An iron crystal magnified 165 billion times.
belgium.chocoDesc: Pralines, ganache, and ancestral know-how. Belgium produces over 600,000 tons of chocolate per year.
belgium.friesDesc: The secret? Double frying. Once at 140°C to poach, a second time at 170°C to brown.

belgium.comicsDesc: Tintin, Spirou, The Smurfs... Here comics are king.
